messages.message:
Facing the same issue.
`docker: Error response from daemon: Conflict. The container name "/instabase-job-service" is already in use by container "f6e819b6992850a4caaf3c89b7649aad17cfb2b39e8a5282d07acb6473c2b1c1". You have to remove (or rename) that container to be able to reuse that name.`
Tried running docker rm <containerid> to delete old containers but that gets stuck too

Even tried
`owner@dev:~$ sudo docker system prune -a -f`
Getting the following error
`Error response from daemon: a prune operation is already running`
suspending and resuming the sandbox usually solves this for me.
You can also try removing the container folder from `/var/lib/docker/containers` and restarting your workspace

suspending and resuming sandbox for now. Worked
Will try the other cmd next time
tried docker rm -f containername  but that hanged too
Ah yeah, Iâ€™ve had that happen before. The docker daemon breaks sometimes
You can run cs sandbox restart dev in that case
